doc.title: Chuen shiu saam fong dai
doc.plot: During an effort to foil a burglary, Stephen, a singer, has become buddies with Gary, a tour guide and Simon,an accountant. To celebrate the "last summer of the century" they put aside their own busy schedules to spend a few days on tranquil Lamma Island. What seems to be a normal excursion is actually an escape for the three young men from their problems that seem to have no solution...
